job_description:
10+ yrs (Developer) IT Professionals throughout the Software Development Life Cycle Experience
Must have used Java EE frameworks
Working experience of developing Web-based Java EE and Cloud-Native applications using XML, DOM, SAX, and XSLT, DHTML/HTML, Struts, Angular, React / Redux, Node.js, GraphQL, JSON, Spring Boot, Spring MVC, JavaScript, Web Services
Cloud-Native product development including:
o Configuration / Builds: Harvest (or similar), Ant, GitHub / GitLab
o UML modeling tools, e.g. PowerDesigner
o Eclipse, Visual Studio
o JUnit, Log4J, Struts, iTEXT, Jasper Reports, Jakarta Commons Beans
Public Sector experience
